name: Pixel Formula drag race
description:
Want to go back in time when we played games to have fun and it was easy to play those racing arcades? We developed an old school formula drag racing game called: Pixel Formula drag race where you race with formula one car. Graphic design is similar to games from 80s.

How to play:
To move your formula just touch on the left or the right side of your screen and formula will move. Game speed will increase after time so it will be harder to avoid other vehicles.

If you like Pixel Formula drag race give it a rate and a review.
